title: E-commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB
details:
# E-commerce Platform

A comprehensive e-commerce solution featuring user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, and payment integration. Built with modern web technologies and following best practices for scalability and performance.

## Key Features

### ðŸ›’ Shopping Experience
- **Product Catalog** with advanced filtering and search
- **Shopping Cart** with persistent state
- **Wishlist** functionality
- **Product Reviews** and ratings

### ðŸ‘¤ User Management
- **User Authentication** with JWT tokens
- **Profile Management** with order history
- **Address Book** for shipping
- **Password Reset** functionality

### ðŸ’³ Payment Integration
- **Stripe Integration** for secure payments
- **Multiple Payment Methods** (cards, PayPal)
- **Order Tracking** system
- **Invoice Generation**

## Technical Architecture

### Frontend (React)
```javascript
// Redux store structure
const store = {
  auth: { user, token, isAuthenticated },
  products: { items, filters, loading },
  cart: { items, total, shipping },
  orders: { history, current, tracking }
};
```

### Backend (Node.js/Express)
```javascript
// API endpoints
app.use('/api/auth', authRoutes);
app.use('/api/products', productRoutes);
app.use('/api/cart', cartRoutes);
app.use('/api/orders', orderRoutes);
app.use('/api/payments', paymentRoutes);
```

### Database Schema (MongoDB)
```javascript
// User Schema
const userSchema = {
  email: String,
  password: String,
  profile: {
    firstName: String,
    lastName: String,
    addresses: [AddressSchema]
  },
  orders: [OrderSchema]
};
```

## Performance Optimizations

- **Code Splitting** with React.lazy()
- **Image Optimization** with lazy loading
- **API Caching** with Redis
- **Database Indexing** for fast queries

> ðŸ“ˆ **Performance Metrics**: 95+ Lighthouse score, <2s page load time

## Security Features

1. **HTTPS Everywhere** - SSL/TLS encryption
2. **Input Validation** - Prevent SQL injection
3. **Rate Limiting** - API protection
4. **Secure Headers** - CORS, CSP policies

## Deployment

- **Frontend**: Deployed on Vercel with CDN
- **Backend**: Deployed on AWS EC2 with load balancer
- **Database**: MongoDB Atlas with replica sets
- **CI/CD**: GitHub Actions for automated deployment

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates
details:
# Task Management App

A real-time collaborative task management application that allows teams to organize projects, assign tasks, and track progress. Features include drag-and-drop kanban boards, real-time notifications, and team collaboration tools.

## Core Features

### ðŸ“‹ Project Management
- **Kanban Boards** with drag-and-drop functionality
- **Task Cards** with detailed information
- **Project Templates** for quick setup
- **Custom Workflows** and stages

### ðŸ‘¥ Team Collaboration
- **Real-time Updates** with Socket.io
- **Team Chat** and comments
- **@Mentions** and notifications
- **File Attachments** and sharing

### ðŸ“Š Analytics & Reporting
- **Progress Tracking** with visual charts
- **Time Tracking** and estimates
- **Performance Metrics** per team member
- **Export Reports** in multiple formats

## Technical Implementation

### Real-time Communication
```typescript
// Socket.io event handling
interface TaskUpdate {
  taskId: string;
  boardId: string;
  newStatus: string;
  updatedBy: string;
}

socket.on('task:updated', (update: TaskUpdate) => {
  dispatch(updateTaskStatus(update));
  showNotification(`Task moved by ${update.updatedBy}`);
});
```

### Database Design (PostgreSQL)
```sql
-- Task table with relationships
CREATE TABLE tasks (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  status task_status DEFAULT 'todo',
  assignee_id UUID REFERENCES users(id),
  project_id UUID REFERENCES projects(id),
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
  due_date TIMESTAMP
);
```

### Drag & Drop Implementation
```typescript
// React DnD setup
const [{ isDragging }, drag] = useDrag({
  type: 'TASK',
  item: { id: task.id, status: task.status },
  collect: (monitor) => ({
    isDragging: monitor.isDragging()
  })
});
```

## Key Technologies

- **TypeScript** for type safety
- **React** with hooks and context
- **Socket.io** for real-time features
- **PostgreSQL** with JSONB for flexibility
- **Redis** for session management
- **Docker** for containerization

## Performance Features

### Optimizations
- **Virtual Scrolling** for large task lists
- **Debounced Search** to reduce API calls
- **Optimistic Updates** for better UX
- **Connection Pooling** for database efficiency

### Monitoring
```javascript
// Performance monitoring
const performanceMetrics = {
  taskLoadTime: '<200ms',
  realTimeLatency: '<50ms',
  concurrentUsers: '500+',
  uptime: '99.9%'
};
```

## Security & Authentication

- **JWT Tokens** with refresh mechanism
- **Role-based Permissions** (Admin, Manager, Member)
- **Data Encryption** at rest and in transit
- **Audit Logs** for all actions

## Mobile Responsiveness

- **PWA Support** for mobile installation
- **Touch-friendly** drag and drop
- **Offline Mode** with sync on reconnect
- **Push Notifications** for updates
